General.Name: WIZIT Co. Ltd
General.Description: WIZIT Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells LCD and semiconductor equipment in South Korea and internationally. It offers LCD parts, including upper and lower electrodes, susceptors, diffusers, chucks, and coater chucks; and semiconductor parts comprising gas diffusers, and chambers and walls. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Incheon, South Korea.

1.Name: Gui-Il  Jung
1.Title: Director of TMS Bus. Division and Director
